scripted_ents.Alias.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] 

[string] alias
  A new string which can be used to refer to another classname

[string] classname
  The classname the alias should refer to

scripted_ents.Get.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] Returns a copy of the ENT table for a class, including functions defined by the base class

[string] classname
  The classname of the ENT table to return, can be an alias

scripted_ents.GetMember.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] Retrieves a member of entity's table.

[string] class
  Entity's class name

[string] name
  Name of member to retrieve

scripted_ents.GetStored.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] Returns the actual ENT table for a class. Modifying functions/variables in this table will change newly spawned entities

[string] classname
  The classname of the ENT table to return

scripted_ents.GetType.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] 

[string] classname
  The classname to check

scripted_ents.IsBasedOn.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] Checks if name is based on base

[string] name
  Entity's class name to be checked

[string] base
  Base class name to be checked

scripted_ents.Register.description:
SCRIPTED_ENTS [Shared] Registers an ENT table with a classname. Reregistering an existing classname will automatically update the functions of all existing entities of that class.

[table] ENT
  The ENT table to register

[string] classname
  The classname to register
